TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewImageCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: Displays a graphic in a control.

span.span: Displays a graphic in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特殊的类型的用来显示或，具体的值取决于属性。The class is a specialized type of used to display an or an , depending on the value of the property. 通常情况下，属性设置为`true`以指示用户不能编辑单元格内容。Typically, the property of a is set to `true` to indicate that the user cannot edit the cell contents. 列类型专用于保留此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下，函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列的单元格模式的现有后，设置列的到要用作一种模式的单元格的属性。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关属性是同样名称的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格在基于的模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关的属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格并刷新列显示如有必要。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改映像单元格使用中的图像。The following code example demonstrates how to change the image in an image cell using . 此代码示例的主题提供一个更大的示例摘自[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the topic [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用此构造函数，属性设置为的值`valueIsIcon`参数。When you use this constructor, the property is set to the value of the `valueIsIcon` parameter. 若要确保的 alpha 通道正确绘制值，请使用此构造函数用于`valueIsIcon`的参数值`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valueIsIcon` parameter value of `true`. 如果`valueIsIcon`参数是`true`、和属性返回对象，表示类型。If the `valueIsIcon` parameter is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法每当派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

para.span: 在重写派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制任何已添加到派生的类的属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不显式调用 方法，则在引用 属性时将会调用此方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 要获取或设置，你必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。To get or set , you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.

summary.span: Gets the default value that is used when creating a new row.

span.span: Gets the default value that is used when creating a new row.

value.span: 一个对象，包含默认图像占位符，或以显示空单元格。

span.span: An object containing a default image placeholder, or to display an empty cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值应为类型或类型，具体的值取决于属性。The value of this property should be of type or type , depending on the value of the property. 每当显示在可以添加的新行，最后一行是加载使用默认值的单元格的空白新行。Whenever a is displayed in which new rows can be added, the last row is an empty new row of cells loaded with default values. 重写此属性为这些单元格提供不同的默认映像或者若要返回`null`以避免显示图像。Override this property to provide a different default image for these cells or to return `null` to avoid displaying images.

summary.span: Gets or sets the text associated with the image.

span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with the image.

value.span: 在单元格中显示的图像与关联的文本。

span.span: The text associated with the image displayed in the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常会提供每个图像单元格的文本说明。You will typically provide a text description for each image cell. 此说明提供了另一种可到映像。This description provides an accessible alternative to the image. 此外，单元格的值复制到剪贴板时，要使用的说明文本。Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard. 设置所属列的属性也设置的列中每个单元格的属性。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件调用此方法将一个单元格值转换为等效的显示值的类型由指示属性。The control calls this method to convert a cell value into an equivalent display value of the type indicated by the property. 控件将单元格的值传递给此方法在`value`参数。The control passes the cell value to this method in the `value` parameter. 如果`context`参数值包括值，此方法返回的值属性复制到剪贴板。If the `context` parameter value includes the value, this method returns the value of the property for copying to the Clipboard. 否则为事件发生。Otherwise, the event occurs. A事件处理程序可以同时修改`value`和`cellStyle`。A event handler can modify both `value` and `cellStyle`. 如果处理程序不会设置属性`true`，但是，此方法设置的格式`value`使用的格式设置属性`cellStyle`对象。If the handler does not set the property to `true`, however, this method formats `value` using the formatting properties of the `cellStyle` object. 如果格式设置不成功，事件发生。If formatting is unsuccessful, the event occurs. 如果没有为此事件或处理程序集的处理程序属性`true`，将引发异常。If there is no handler for this event or the handler sets the property to `true`, an exception is thrown. 如果格式设置成功并且格式化值的类型匹配的值属性，此方法返回的格式化的值。If formatting is successful and the type of the formatted value matches the value of the property, this method returns the formatted value. 否则，此方法返回通过所指示的类型的标准错误图形属性。Otherwise, this method returns a standard error graphic in the type indicated by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此属性将导致要重绘其自身的单元格。Changing this property will cause the cell to redraw itself. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确保的 alpha 通道正确绘制值，将此属性设置为`true`。To ensure that the alpha channel of values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`. 当此属性是`true`、和属性返回对象，表示类型。When this property is `true`, the and properties return a object representing the type. 设置所属列的属性也设置属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 当此属性的值更改为新记录所在行中的单元格时，在单元格中显示的图像更新的当前值为属性。When the value of this property changes for a cell in the row for new records, the image displayed in the cell is updated to the current value of the property. 与列不同属性，该单元格属性不会自动更新属性关联的单元格样式时更改其值。Unlike the column property, the cell property does not automatically update the property of the associated cell style when you change its value. 当你更改单元格属性值设置为`true`，请务必设置属性返回的对象到有效的属性。When you change the cell property value to `true`, be sure to set the property of the object returned by the property to a valid . 当你更改属性值设置为`false`，请务必设置到有效的属性。When you change the property value to `false`, be sure to set the property to a valid .

MemberSignature.Value: public override Type ValueType { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Type ValueType
Public Overrides Property ValueType As Type
public: virtual property Type ^ ValueType { Type ^ get(); void set(Type ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.

span.span: Gets or sets the data type of the values in the cell.
The of the cell's value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索此属性，如果时为尚未设置单元格，则有关使用所属的列，如果它存在。When retrieving this property, if the for the cell has not been set, then the for the owning column is used, if it exists. 如果所属列不存在，使用默认值类型，即键入如果属性设置为`false`和否则键入。If no owning column exists, the default value type is used, which is the type if the property is set to `false` and the type otherwise. 是包含在单元格中的实际数据对象，而属性是此对象的格式的表示。The is the actual data object contained in the cell, whereas the property is the formatted representation of this object. 和属性分别对应于这些值的数据类型。The and properties correspond to the data types of these values, respectively.
